title.narrative: Strengthening the primary assistance of the Health System and Mental Health for refugees, migrants and host community of Lima north and Lima east.

description.narrative: L’iniziativa mira a rafforzare il sistema di salute pubblico per ampliare l’accesso alle persone peruviane, rifiugiate e migranti venezuelani al sistema di salute. Inoltre si rafforzeranno i servizi complementari di assistenza primaria e supporto psicosociale con l’obiettivo di un miglioramento della salute mentale

The programme aims to strength the public health system in order to widen the access to Peruvians, refugees and Venezuelan migrants to the system itself. Besides, primary assistance complementary services and psychosocial support will be strengthened to improve mental health
